data.title: Newton Centre
data.meta_description: Station serving MBTA Subway lines at 72 Union St, Newton, MA 02459.
data.text:
Information & Support

Monday thru Friday: 6:30 AM - 8 PM Saturday thru Sunday: 8 AM - 4 PM

Main: 617-222-3200

711 for TTY callers; VRS for ASL callers

Report a Railroad Crossing Gate Issue

To report a problem or emergency with a railroad crossing, call 800-522-8236
